summary: Makes it possible to hit multiple opponents with one handed and two handed weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Sweeping weapons makes it more comfortable to be an melee fighter since you will be able to hit multiple opponents with it, whether you are using one handed or two handed weapons. 


Changes.
Sweeping Two-handers.
-Rearranged the perk tree, Warmaster can now be found where Sweep was located before and Sweep can be found where Warmaster was.
-Warmaster has it\'s requirements changed, Warmaster now requires 70 points in Two-handed and one of the following perks Great Critical Charge or Devastating Blow.
-Sweep has been changed so it affects all your regular attacks and powerattacks!
-Sweep has it\'s requirements changed, Sweep now requires 100 points in Two-handed and the following perk, Warmaster.

Sweeping Two-handers lite.
-This is only making changes to the Sweep perk, so no changes to the perk tree, this is for those people who want\'s more powerful two-handers earlier and those who use other mods that changes the other perk skills in the two-handed per tree.

Sweeping One-handers.
-A one-handed sweep, this is restricted by the requirements 70 points in one-handed and one of the following perks Savage Strike or Critical Charge, it\'s been added with a custom perk so the ordinary Sweep is still in game.
-Only works with sideways powerattacks.

Sweeping One-handers lite.
-A one-handed sweep, this is restricted by the requirements 70 points in one-handed and one of the following perks Savage Strike or Critical Charge, it\'s been added with a custom perk so the ordinary Sweep is still in game.
-This will work for all one handed attacks.




P.S Don\'t hit Lydia, she will get mad at you :P

Update.
-Was a bug in the skill window, should be fixed now.
-Added a one-hander version.
-Added a two-hander lite version.
-Added a one-hander lite version.

Notice.
-You can only use one of each version of these files, so using a one-handed and two-handed version will work, but not a one-handed and one-handed!
-The one-handed version will not work with any respec mods i know of since it\'s a custom perk, remember that.
-Dual wielding will also have the effect, sweep away!
-If you are using daggers with the one-handed version the effect might not be seen since the small reach of the weapon, longer weapon=longer arch of the sweep it seems.
author: Danni
